title: Real Time Economics: Budget Blowout | Inflation in Focus | China Chides ‘Cold War’ Mentality
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. In today’s issue, U.S. budget deficits are ballooning, China’s investment in the U.S. slides while the country’s president says a ‘zero-sum’ world view is out of place, Trump promises to protect farmers, manufacturers are wary of a trade war, and Japan     Investors Question Global Growth | No Fed Bailout for Markets | White House Softens Trade Rhetoric Next Should the U.S. Worry That China Is Closing In on Its Lead in Research and Development?
